varietals.name: Milkweed
varietals.description: One milkweed seed can become a habitat for monarch butterflies at Bela Farm.

varietals.name: Lettuce
varietals.description: One lettuce seed can provide 2 week’s worth of salad greens for JF & CS gardeners at Maxie’s Garden in Kensington Market.

varietals.name: Beet
varietals.description: One beet seed grown at the Kavanah Garden will  add a nutritious boost to hungry community members  borscht  through our partnership with Chasdei Kaduri.

varietals.name: Sunflower
varietals.description: One sunflower seed can feed thousands of our honey bees at Bela Farm or provide added beauty at a community member’s Shabbat table.
